amendment.description: To provide certain authorities, requirements, and limitations on foreign assistance and arms exports.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 3378 withdrawn in Senate.
Amendment SA 3378 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Biden. (consideration: CR S7152-7160) To provide certain authorities, requirements, and limitations on foreign assistance and arms exports.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3378 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Biden.
